product_name: Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts - Women's Plus Sizes - 7.5" Inseam
long_description: Dig in and give it all you've got in the easy-going fit of the plus-size Endurance Shorts for women from Moving Comfort. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric offers high performance; fabric offers a rating of UPF 50+ to protect skin from harsh UV light. Wide waistband with a stretchy drawcord dials in the fit, and heathered interior enhances comfort. Zippered rear pocket secures essentials. The formfitting women's Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts in plus sizes move with you during workouts without binding.
short_description: Dig in and give it all you've got in the easy-going fit of the plus-size Endurance Shorts for women from Moving Comfort.
